divs: Sighting Details Camped at the far end of first water canyon, Ithought I saw lightening fash andlooked out of my tent. Inoticed very brightlight above me and looked up.There was a huge black triangle in the sky at ninep.m. at night. After watching it for ten minutes,I grabed camera the craftimmediately faded up in the sky. Still sitting on the ground with camera ready Iwaited tentofifteen minutes for anything A large silver saucer appeared to hteright or west of where the first craft was sighted.Raising the camera I quicklysnapped a photoo alas it wouldd not be photogrhaped by me this night .Each timeI camp in the superstitions, I ALWAYS see at least one u.f.o. eacch night! Itis my belieaf that many other people see them there,they just dont report it!!!
